XXnagvigvu:2: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
XXnagvigvu:3: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ // NagVv_1 //
XXnagvigvu:4: yadi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ hetau pratyayeṣu ca hetupratyayasāmagrāñ ca pṛthak ca yatra sarvatra svabhāvo na vidyata iti kṛtvā śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:7: na pratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ na hetupratyayavinirmuktaḥ pṛthag eva vā |
XXnagvigvu:8: yasmād atra svabhāvo nāsti tasmān niḥsvabhāvo 'ṅkuraḥ |
XXnagvigvu:10: yathā cāyam aṅkuro niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvāc ca śūnyaḥ tathā sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnya iti |
XXnagvigvu:13: yady evaṃ tavāpi vacanaṃ yady etac chūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad api śūnyaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad api hetau nāsti |
XXnagvigvu:15: mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti |
XXnagvigvu:26: nāsatībhir atbhiḥ śakyaṃ kledayitum evam asattā vacanena śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo nivartayituṃ |
XXnagvigvu:27: tatra yad uktaṃ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣidhaḥ sarvatra bhāvasvabhāvo vinivartata iti |
XXnagvigvu:30: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hata pratijñā te /
XXnagvigvu:31: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_2 //
XXnagvigvu:32: athāpi manyase mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:34: tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo vinivarta iti ||
XXnagvigvu:36: yā hi te pratijñā śūnyāḥ svabhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:37: hatā śā || kiñcānyat sarvabhāvāntargatañ ca tadvacanam |
XXnagvigvu:38: kasmāt sarvabhāveṣu tvadvacanam aśūnyaṃ yenāśūnyatvāt sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ || evaṃ ṣaṭkoṭiko vādaḥ prasaktaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:40: hanta cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvahhāvās tena tvadvacanaṃ śūnyam sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt tvadvacanasya
XXnagvigvu:42: tatra yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāva iti anupapannaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:43: upapannaś cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaśūnyatvād anena pratiṣedho anupapannaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:44: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvās tvadvacanañ cāśūnyaḥ yena pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaṃ sarvatrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ
XXnagvigvu:46: sarvatra cet punaḥ gṛhītaṃ tvadvacanaṃ sarvabhāvāś ca śūnyāḥ |
XXnagvigvu:47: tena tad api śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād anena nāsti pratiṣedhaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:48: atha śūnyam asti vānena pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti tena śūnyāpi sarvabhāvāḥ kāryakriyāsamarthā samarthabhaveyuḥ |
XXnagvigvu:50: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ na ca kāryaṃ kriyāsamarthaṃ bhavaṃti mā bhūt dṛṣṭāntavirodha iti kṛtvā śūnyena tvadvacanena sarvabhāvāsvabhāvo pratiṣedho nopapanna iti |
XXnagvigvu:55: yena hi viśeṣahetunā kiñcit śūnyaṃ kiñcid aśūnyaṃ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:57: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:59: kiñcānyat mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
XXnagvigvu:60: śabdenātra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVv_3 //
XXnagvigvu:61: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā nāma kaścit brūyāt mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti |
XXnagvigvu:64: śūnyena vacanena sarvatā sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti |
XXnagvigvu:67: satā hy atra śabdena hy atra bhaviṣyataḥ śabdasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:68: na punar iha bhavataḥ satā vacanena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:69: tava hi matena vacanam apy asat |
XXnagvigvu:71: tasmād ayaṃ mā śabdavad iti viṣayopanyāso 'sann iti ||
XXnagvigvu:73: kiñca pratipratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
XXnagvigvu:74: evaṃ tava pratijña lakṣaṇato dūṣyate na mama // NagVv_4 //
XXnagvigvu:75: syāt te buddhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py anenaiva kalpenānupapannaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:80: kasmāt tava ca hi pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptam etan na mama bhavān iha bravīti |
XXnagvigvu:84: tatra yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evaṃ matam iti |
XXnagvigvu:88: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
XXnagvigvu:89: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVv_5 //
XXnagvigvu:90: yadi pratyakṣataḥ sarvabhāvān upalabhya bhavān nivartayati śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:92: kasmāt pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇaṃ svabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:93: yo 'pi sarvabhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyas tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena nopalambhabhāvo anupalabdhasya ca pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:97: anumānenāgamenopānena vā sarvabhāvān upalabhya sarvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti ||
XXnagvigvu:101: anumānam apy upamānāgamāś ca pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena pratyuktāḥ |
XXnagvigvu:102: yathā hi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt |
XXnagvigvu:107: te 'pi śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt* anumānopamānāgamaiś ca yo 'pi bhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyaḥ tasmāt bbāvānām upalambhābhāvo 'nupalabdhānāñ ca svabhāvapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:112: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVv_7 //
XXnagvigvu:113: iha dharmāvasthāvido manyante kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ |
XXnagvigvu:116: sparśasya manasikārasya chandasyādhimokṣasya vīryasya smṛteḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā upekṣāyāḥ prayogasya saṃprayogasya prāpto 'dhyāśayasya prativirateḥ vyavasāyā autsukyasya |
XXnagvigvu:117: unmūrdhe utsāhasya avyārtyasya vasitāyāḥ pratipatter avipratīsārasya dhṛter adhyavasāyasya
XXnagvigvu:124: prekṣupratikūlasya pradakṣiṇagrāhasya vaiśāradyagauravasya citrīkārasya (Vv 234) bhakter abhakteḥ
XXnagvigvu:126: hāsasya vācaḥ viṣpandanāyāḥ siddhasyāprasādasya aprasrabdheḥ vyavahāratāyaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:129: apradakṣiṇagrāhasya saṃepasya saṃvarāṇāṃ pariśuddher adhyāśayasya rūpasyeti |
XXnagvigvu:132: amada alobha adoṣa amoha asarvat* apratiniḥsargaḥ vibhava apatrayā apariśucchadanaṃ mānanaṃ kāruṇyaṃ maitrī
XXnagvigvu:133: adīnatādaritamari.(d)ha + + nupanāhaḥ alī cetaso paryādānaṃ kṣāntiḥ |
XXnagvigvu:137: nairyāṇikatāsarvajñatāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ ity ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ kuśalānāṃ kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ ||
XXnagvigvu:155: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnya iti tan na |
XXnagvigvu:158: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣāṃ /
XXnagvigvu:160: iha ca dharmo 'vasthoktānāṃ nairyāṇikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇikaḥ svabhāvaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:166: evaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ tad yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:170: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evaṃ /
XXnagvigvu:171: nāmāpi bhavet naivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukan nāsti // NagVv_9 //
XXnagvigvu:172: yadi ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvāc cāśūnyaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ |
XXnagvigvu:173: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:176: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
XXnagvigvu:177: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVv_10 //
XXnagvigvu:178: atha manyase mā bhūd avastukaṃ nāmeti kṛtvāsti svabhāvaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:180: evaṃ dharmaśūnyatā ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dharmāṇāṃ siddhā bhaviṣyati |
XXnagvigvu:183: evaṃ kasyedānīṃ sa svabhāvo dharmavinirmuktasyārthasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum arthaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:184: sa ca nopadiṣṭas tasmād yā kalpanāsti svabhāvo na punar dharmāṇām iti sā hīnā ||
XXnagvigvu:186: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
XXnagvigvu:187: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVv_11 //
XXnagvigvu:188: iha ca sato 'rthasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate nāmataḥ |
XXnagvigvu:192: evam eva nasti svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti |
XXnagvigvu:195: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na || pratiṣedhasaṃbhavād eva hi sarvabhāvasvabhāvasvabhāvo
XXnagvigvu:197: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin na pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
XXnagvigvu:198: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_12 //
XXnagvigvu:199: nāsty eva svabhāvā ity anena vacanena niḥsvabhāvā bhāvā iti kiṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate |
XXnagvigvu:200: asato hi vacād vinā siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:205: evaṃ mithyāḥ grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_13 //
XXnagvigvu:206: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā bālānāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ mithyājalam iti grāho bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:207: nanu nirjalā sā mṛgatṛṣṇeti tatra paṇḍitajātīyena puruṣeṇocyate |
XXnagvigvu:208: tasya mithyāgrāhasya vinivartanārtham evan niḥsvabhāveṣu yaḥ svabhāvo grāhaḥ satvānāṃ tasya vyāvartanārthan niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity ucyata iti ||
XXnagvigvu:211: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyañ ca tadgrahītā ca /
XXnagvigvu:212: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVv_14 //
XXnagvigvu:213: yady evaṃ nanv evaṃ saty asti tāvat satvānāṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:215: asti pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāpi mithyāgrāhasyāsti pratiṣedhyaṃ yad idaṃ mithyāgrāhyaṃ nāma |
XXnagvigvu:219: yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:220: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
XXnagvigvu:221: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhāro 'py ata na santi // NagVv_15 //
XXnagvigvu:222: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti kṛtvā naiva grāho 'sti naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāra iti |
XXnagvigvu:223: evaṃ sati yo 'sau grāhasya pratiṣedhaḥ niḥsvahhāvāḥ
XXnagvigvu:225: so 'pi nāsti pratiṣedhyam api nāsti pratiṣedhāro 'pi na santi |
XXnagvigvu:227: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhārāaś ca yady uta na santi /
XXnagvigvu:228: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣām evaṃ svabhāvaś ca // NagVv_16 //
XXnagvigvu:229: yadi ca na pratiṣedho na pratiṣedhyaṃ na pratiṣeddhāraḥ santy apratisiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā asti ca sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ ||
XXnagvigvu:231: hetoḥ svato na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
XXnagvigvu:232: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVv_17 //
XXnagvigvu:233: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity etasmin arthe te hetor asiddhiḥ |
XXnagvigvu:234: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād dhi sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvān na tato hetuḥ |
XXnagvigvu:235: asati hetau nirhetukasyārthasya śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti kuta eva prasiddhiḥ || tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:237: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
XXnagvigvu:239: atha manyase nairhetukī siddhiḥ niḥsvabhāvatvasya bhāvānām iti |
XXnagvigvu:243: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvānaiḥsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
XXnagvigvu:244: loko naiḥsvabhāvyān na hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVv_19 //
XXnagvigvu:246: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad anupapannaṃ || kiṃ karaṇaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:247: na hi loke niḥsvabhāvaḥ kaścid bhāvo 'sti ||
XXnagvigvu:249: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti na copapannam /
XXnagvigvu:250: yaś cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'san // NagVv_20 //
XXnagvigvu:251: iha pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāc ca pratiṣedhyaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:253: asati hi pratiṣedhye kasya pratiṣedhaḥ || atha paścāt pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣedhyam iti ca nopapannaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:254: siddhe hi pratiṣedhye kiṃ pratiṣedhaḥ karoti |
XXnagvigvu:255: atha yugapatpratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhye tathāpi na pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhyasyārthasya kāraṇaṃ prati na pratiṣedhyaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:257: yathā yugapadutpannayor goviṣāṇayoḥ naiva dakṣiṇaṃ savyasya kāraṇaṃ savyaṃ vā dakṣiṇasya gāraṇaṃ bhavatīti |
XXnagvigvu:258: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na |
XXnagvigvu:261: yat tāvad bhavatoktaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet |
XXnagvigvu:262: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam iti |
XXnagvigvu:265: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVv_21 //
XXnagvigvu:266: yadi madvaco hetau nāsti mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti |
XXnagvigvu:268: sāmagryām asti heṃpratyayasāmagrīṃ vinirmuktaṃ pṛthag vāsti |
XXnagvigvu:271: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād asya madīyavacasaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:274: yad bhavatoktaṃ tvadīyavacasaḥ śūnyatvāt śūnyatā sarvabhāvānāṃ nopapadyata iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:277: yaś ca pratītya bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti taṃ brū + + /
XXnagvigvu:278: yas tu pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_22 //
XXnagvigvu:279: śūnyatārthañ ca bhavān bhāvānām anavasamya śūnyatārtham ajñātvā pravṛtti upālambhaṃ vaktuṃ tvadvacanasya śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ tvadvacanena niḥsvabhāvena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedho nopapadyata iti |
XXnagvigvu:280: iha hi yaḥ pratītya bhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ sā śūnyatā |
XXnagvigvu:282: ye hi pratītyasamutpānnā bhāvās te sa sasvabhāvā bhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:288: tasmān niḥsvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnyā ity abhidhīyante |
XXnagvigvu:290: pratītyasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyam ity upapannaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:293: rathapaṭaghaṭādayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu kāṣṭhāhaṇamṛttikaharaṇamadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇā śītavātātapaparitrāṇaprabhṛtiṣu vartante |
XXnagvigvu:294: evam idaṃ madīyavacanaṃ pratyayasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaprasādhanaṃ pratyayabhāvānāṃ vartate |
XXnagvigvu:296: niḥsvabhavatvāt tvadīyavacanasya śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvāt tasya ca tena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedha upapannam iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:300: pratiṣedhayati yadvat pratiṣedho yaṃ tathaiva syāt // NagVv_23 //
XXnagvigvu:301: yathā nirmitakaḥ puruṣam abhyāpataṃ tu kaścid arthena vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet |
XXnagvigvu:302: māyākāreṇa vā sṛṣṭo māyāpurnṣo 'nyaṃ māyāpuruṣa samabhyava tan na kasminścid arthe vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet |
XXnagvigvu:303: tatra yo nirmitakaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiṣedhyate sa śūnyaḥ yaḥ pratiṣedhayati so 'pi māyāpuruṣaḥ śūnya evam eva madvacanena śūnyena sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedha upapannaḥ || tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:304: śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedho nopapannam iti na tan na |
XXnagvigvu:305: ṣaṭkoṭiko vāda uktaḥ sa evaṃ pratisiddhaḥ naiva hy evaṃ sati na sarvabhāvāntargataṃ madvacanaṃ nāpy aśūnyaṃ nāpi sarvabhāvāśūnyāḥ |
XXnagvigvu:307: yat punar bhavatoktam atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavya ity [2]
XXnagvigvu:309: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
XXnagvigvu:310: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśesahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ // NagVv_24 //
XXnagvigvu:311: na tāvad etan mama vacanaṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvopapannaṃ yathā pūrvam uktaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:313: yasmāc ca idam api madvacanaṃ śūnyaṃ śeṣāpi sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyās tasmān nāsti vaiṣamikatvaṃ
XXnagvigvu:315: idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti tato vaiṣamikatvaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:316: syān na caitad evaṃ tasmān na vaiṣamikatvaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:317: yasmāc ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ punaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti
XXnagvigvu:318: tasmād asmābhir viśeṣahetur api na vaktavyaḥ anena idaṃ vacanaṃ aśūnyaṃ sarvabhāvāḥ punaḥ śūnyā iti |
XXnagvigvu:319: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ vādahānis te vaiṣamikatvaṃ ca viśeṣahetuś ca tvayā vaktavya iti tan na |
XXnagvigvu:322: mā śabdavad ity etad asmāt te buddhir na caitad upapannaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:323: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti |
XXnagvigvu:325: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā mamārahdhaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:326: śabdena hi tac ca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naidam eva caḥ // NagVv_25 //
XXnagvigvu:328: yathā kaścin mā śabdaṃ karṣīr iti bruvaṃ śabdam eva karoti śabdañ ca pratiṣedhayati |
XXnagvigvu:331: atra hi dṛṣṭānte śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:333: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt tad aśūnyām iti |
XXnagvigvu:335: kiṃ karaṇaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
XXnagvigvu:336: naiḥsvabhāvyanirvṛttau svabhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // NagVv_26 //
XXnagvigvu:337: yathā mā śabdam iti śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:338: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ vyāvartanaṃ kriyate tato 'yaṃ
XXnagvigvu:340: iha tu naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:341: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena niḥsvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvabhāvyapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate |
XXnagvigvu:344: śūnyatāñ ca vayaṃ bhāvānām ācakṣmahe nāśūnyatām ity adṛṣṭānta evāyam iti |
XXnagvigvu:346: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyam ity asatgrāham /
XXnagvigvu:347: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasyacid evaṃ bhaved ettata // NagVv_27 //
XXnagvigvu:348: atha vā kasyacit puruṣasya nirmitakāyāṃ striyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyāyāṃ paramārthataḥ striyam ity asadgrāhaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:349: syād eva tasyāṃ tenāsadgrāheṇa rāgam utpādayet |
XXnagvigvu:350: tad yathā tathāgatena vā tacchrāvakeṇa vā nirmitako nirmitaḥ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:351: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatasrāvakādhiṣṭhānena vā tasya tam asadgrāhaṃ vinivartayet |
XXnagvigvu:352: evam eva nirmitakopamena śūnyena vacanena nirmitakastrīsadṛśyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu yo 'yaṃ svabbāvagrāhaḥ sa nivartyate sa pratiṣidhyate |
XXnagvigvu:353: tasmād ayam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ śūnyatāprasādhanaṃ pratyupapadyamāno netaraḥ |
XXnagvigvu:355: atha vā sādhyasamo yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
XXnagvigvu:356: saṃvyavahārañ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVv_28 //
XXnagvigvu:357: mā śabdavad iti sādhyasama evāyaṃ hetuḥ |
XXnagvigvu:362: yad uktaṃ śabdena hy atra sattā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti |
XXnagvigvu:364: api ca na vayaṃ vyavahārasatyaṃ pratyākhyāya vyavahārasatyam anabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:366: na hi vyavahārasatyam anāgamya śakyā dharmadeśanā kartuṃ |
XXnagvigvu:367: yathoktaṃ vyavahāram anāśritya paramārtho na deśyate |
XXnagvigvu:369: tasmān madvacanavat śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvānāñ ca niḥsvabhāvatvam ubhayathopapadyamānam iti ||
XXnagvigvu:372: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva |
XXnagvigvu:373: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato dūṣyeta na mameti |
XXnagvigvu:375: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syān na me tat* eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:376: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVv_29 //
XXnagvigvu:377: yadi ca kācin mama pratijñā syāt tato mama pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt sa pūrvako doṣaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:378: yathā tvayoktaṃ bhāvāḥ tathā mama syān na ca mama kācid asti pratijñā |
XXnagvigvu:379: tasmāt sarvahhāveṣu śūnyeṣv atyantopaśānteṣu prakṛtivivikteṣu kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇatāprāptikṛto doṣaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:380: tatra yat bhavatoktaṃ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt tavaiva doṣa iti tan nāsti |
XXnagvigvu:382: yat punar bhavatoktaṃ pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya nivartayasi bhāvān tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyaṃta |
XXnagvigvu:383: anumānaṃ pratyuktaṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamopamāne cānumānāgamasādhyā ye 'rthā dṛṣṭāntasādhyāś ceti
XXnagvigvu:385: yadi kiñcid upalabheyaṃ pravarteyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
XXnagvigvu:387: yady ahaṃ kiñcid artham upalabheyaṃ pratyakṣānumānopa + + + + hetubhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ |
XXnagvigvu:390: ata evaṃ pravartayeyaṃ vārtham evāhaṃ kiñcin nopalabhate tasmān na pravartayāmi na nivartayāmi
XXnagvigvu:392: yadi pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānām anyatamena upalabhya bhāvān vinivartayasīti |
XXnagvigvu:393: nanu bhavatoktāni pramāṇāni na santi taiś ca pramāṇair api gamyārthā iti sa me bhavaty evānupālambha iti |
XXnagvigvu:395: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
XXnagvigvu:396: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_31 //
XXnagvigvu:397: prasiddhir iti yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ prameyānāṃ siddhiṃ manyase yathā mānair meyānāṃ |
XXnagvigvu:398: tathā teṣām idānīṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ kutaḥ prasiddhiḥ |
XXnagvigvu:399: yadi tāvan niḥpramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ syān nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya |
XXnagvigvu:400: yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti |
XXnagvigvu:403: tathāpi anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /
XXnagvigvu:404: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVv_32 //
XXnagvigvu:406: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ
XXnagvigvu:408: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya |
XXnagvigvu:410: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ |
XXnagvigvu:411: āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:412: tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti |
XXnagvigvu:414: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhiḥ vihīyate vādaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:415: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_33 //
XXnagvigvu:416: atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti |
XXnagvigvu:417: evaṃ sati yas te vādaḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir arthānām iti hīyate vaiṣamikatvañ ca bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:419: arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:420: yena hetunā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti |
XXnagvigvu:421: sā ca nopadiṣṭaḥ tasmād iyam api kalpanā nopapanneti |
XXnagvigvu:423: pramāṇāny eva mama svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ca prasādhayanti |
XXnagvigvu:425: dyotayati svātmānaṃ yathā hutāsaḥ tathā parātmānaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:430: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
XXnagvigvu:431: na hi tasyānupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVv_34 //
XXnagvigvu:433: agnivat pramāṇāni svātmānañ ca prasādhayanti parātmānañ ca prasādhayantīti |
XXnagvigvu:435: yadi hi yathā prāg evāgninā aprakāśitas tamasi kumbho nopalabhyate |
XXnagvigvu:436: athottarakālam upalabhyate 'gninā prakāśitaḥ san evam eva yady agninā na prakāśitaḥ prāg agniḥ syād uttarakālam agneḥ prakāśanaṃ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:441: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
XXnagvigvu:442: param iva na tv ātmānaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ // NagVv_35 //
XXnagvigvu:443: yadi ca tvadvacanena yathā parātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ evam eva svātmānam api prakāśayaty agnir iti |
XXnagvigvu:447: tatra yad uktaṃ parātmānam iva svātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:449: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
XXnagvigvu:450: prachādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // NagVv_36 //
XXnagvigvu:451: yadi ca bhavato bhavato matena svātmāparātmānau prakāśayaty agniḥ |
XXnagvigvu:454: tatra yad uktaṃ svaparātmānau prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:457: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhate parātmani jvalanaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:458: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo andhakāravadhaḥ // NagVv_37 //
XXnagvigvu:461: prakāśaś ca nāma tamasaḥ pratighātas tatra katham asya tamasaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:467: yasmād evaṃ svaparātmānau na prakāśayaty agniḥ |
XXnagvigvu:468: tena hy utpadyamānenaivāgninā tamasaḥ pratighataḥ kutaḥ tasmān nāgnau tamo 'sti |
XXnagvigvu:470: yasmād utpadyamāna evobhayaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti |
XXnagvigvu:472: atrocyate utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:473: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // NagVv_38 //
XXnagvigvu:474: ayam agnir utpadyamāna eva prakāśayati svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti |
XXnagvigvu:476: kasmān na hy utpadyamāna evāgniḥ tamaḥ prāpnoti |
XXnagvigvu:479: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
XXnagvigvu:480: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthita upahanyāt // NagVv_39 //
XXnagvigvu:481: athāpi manyase aprāpto 'py agnir andhakāram upahantīti |
XXnagvigvu:482: nanv idānīm iha saṃsthito agniḥ sarvalokadhātustham upahaniṣyati tamaḥ tulyāyām aprāpto na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:483: tasmād aprāpyaivāgnir andhakāram upahantīti yad iṣṭaṃ
XXnagvigvu:486: yadi ca svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
XXnagvigvu:487: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāparāpekṣā hi siddhir iti // NagVv_40 //
XXnagvigvu:488: yadi cāgnivat svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir iti manyase |
XXnagvigvu:489: anapekṣāpi prameyāṇi pramāṇānāṃ siddhiḥ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:493: yadi nāpekṣyante prameyān arthān apramāṇāni ko doṣo bhaviṣyatīti |
XXnagvigvu:495: anāpeksā hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ /
XXnagvigvu:496: bhavati na bhavanti kasyacid evam imāni pramāṇāni // NagVv_41 //
XXnagvigvu:497: yadi prameyān arthān anapekṣya siddhir bhavati pramāṇānām iti |
XXnagvigvu:498: tānīmāni pramāṇāni na kasyacit pramāṇāni bhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:499: evaṃ doṣaḥ || atha kasyacit bhavanti prāmāṇāni |
XXnagvigvu:500: naivedānīm anapekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇāni bhavanti ||
XXnagvigvu:502: atha matam apekṣa siddhis teṣām iti atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:503: siddhasya na sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho pekṣate hy anyat // NagVv_42 //
XXnagvigvu:504: athāpi matam apekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇānāṃ siddhir bhavatīti |
XXnagvigvu:505: evaṃ te sati siddhasya pramāṇacatuṣṭayasya sādhanaṃ bhavatīti |
XXnagvigvu:508: na hy asiddho devadattaḥ kañcid artham apekṣate na ca siddhasya sādhanam iṣṭaṃ kṛtasya kāraṇam anupapatter iti ||
XXnagvigvu:510: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
XXnagvigvu:514: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na hi sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayati |
XXnagvigvu:519: yadi ca prameyasiddhir anapekṣaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
XXnagvigvu:520: kin te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yad arthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tata // NagVv_44 //
XXnagvigvu:521: yadi ca manyase 'napekṣyaiva pramāṇāni prameyānāṃ prasiddhir bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:522: kim idānīṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā paryanviṣṭayā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:523: yad arthaṃ hi tāni pramāṇāni paryanviṣyeran |
XXnagvigvu:524: te prameyārthā vinā pramāṇaiḥ siddhāḥ tatra kiṃ pramāṇaiḥ kṛtyaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:525: atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
XXnagvigvu:526: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ // NagVv_45 //
XXnagvigvu:527: athāpi manyase 'pekṣyaiva prameyān arthāna pramāṇani bhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:528: evaṃ te sati mā bhūt pūrvoktadoṣa iti kṛtvā |
XXnagvigvu:536: atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
XXnagvigvu:537: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVv_46 //
XXnagvigvu:538: atha manyase pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhir bhavati pramāṇāpekṣatvāt |
XXnagvigvu:539: prameyasiddhyā ca pramāṇasiddhir bhavati prameyāpekṣatvād iti || evaṃ saty ubhayasyāpi siddhir na .y. + + + + ṇaṃ sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair evā /
XXnagvigvu:540: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_47 //
XXnagvigvu:541: yadi hi pramāṇaiḥ pramayāṇi sidhyanti tāni pramāṇāni tair eva prameyaiḥ sādhayitavyāni |
XXnagvigvu:542: nanv asiddheṣu prameyeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayisyanti prameyāṇīti |
XXnagvigvu:544: sidhyanti ca prameyaiḥ yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
XXnagvigvu:545: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_48 //
XXnagvigvu:546: yadi prameyaiḥ pramāṇāni sidhyanti tāni ca prameyāṇi tair eva pramāṇaiḥ sādhayitavyānīti |
XXnagvigvu:547: nanv asiddheṣu pramāṇeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti pramāṇāni |
XXnagvigvu:548: pitra yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
XXnagvigvu:549: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kaṃ // NagVv_49 //
XXnagvigvu:551: pitrā putra utpādanīyaḥ sa ca pitā putreṇotpādanīya iti |
XXnagvigvu:554: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāni sādhayitavyāni tāny eva ca punaḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ prameyaiḥ tatredānīṃ tu katamaiḥ katamāni sādhayitavyāni |
XXnagvigvu:556: kaś ca pitā kaḥ putraḥ tatra tvaṃ brūhi kathaṃ tāv ubhāv api ca /
XXnagvigvu:557: pitreputralakṣaṇadharau yato nas tatra saṃdehaḥ // NagVv_50 //
XXnagvigvu:558: tayoś ca pūrvopadiṣṭayoḥ pitāputrayoḥ vada kataraḥ putraḥ kataraḥ pitā ubhāv api tāv utpādakatvāt pitṛlakṣaṇadharau |
XXnagvigvu:559: utpādyatvāc ca putralakṣaṇadharāv atra naḥ sandeho bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:560: kataras tatra pitā kataras tatra putra iti |
XXnagvigvu:564: ubhayāny api hy etāni pramāṇāni tāni prameyāṇi sādhyatvāt prameyāṇīti |
XXnagvigvu:568: naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ pramāṇair vā /
XXnagvigvu:569: bhavati na ca prameyaiḥ na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_51 //
XXnagvigvu:570: na svataḥ prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣasya tenaiva pratyakṣeṇānumānasya tenaivānumāne |
XXnagvigvu:573: nāpi parasyāt pratyakṣasyānumānopamānāgamair anumānasya pratyakṣopamānāgamair upamānasya pratyakṣānumānāgamaiḥ
XXnagvigvu:575: nāpi pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamād anyaiḥ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamair yathāsvaṃ nāpi prameyaiḥ samastavyastaiḥ svaviṣayaparaviṣatāgṛhītaiḥ nāpy akasmān nāsti samuccayena |
XXnagvigvu:576: eteṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pūrvoddiṣṭānāṃ viṃśas triṃśac catvāriśat ṣaṭviṃśatir vā tatra yad uktaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:577: pramāṇādhigamyatvāt prameyāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ santi tu prameyā bhāvās tāni ca pramāṇāni yais tu pramāṇaiḥ prameyā bhāvāḥ santaś ca bhāvāḥ samādhigatā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:581: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:585: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavidaḥ kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante |
XXnagvigvu:587: syād ayaṃ sa kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ ime te kuśalā dharmā iti |
XXnagvigvu:588: idaṃ tatkuśalavijñānam ayaṃ kuśalavijñānasvabhāva evaṃ sarveṣāṃ na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:589: tasmād yad uktam upadiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:592: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
XXnagvigvu:593: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva eva kathaṃ bhavati // NagVv_53 //
XXnagvigvu:594: yadi ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītyotpadyate
XXnagvigvu:595: | parabhāvād utpannaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ svabhāvo bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:603: atha na pratītya kiñcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
XXnagvigvu:604: dharmāṇām evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya // NagVv_54 //
XXnagvigvu:606: na kiñcit pratītya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalasvabhāva utpadyate |
XXnagvigvu:607: evam akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām akuśalaḥ avyākṛtānām avyākṛta iti |
XXnagvigvu:608: evaṃ saty abrahmacaryavāso bhavati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:609: pratītyasamutpādasya hi evaṃ sati pratyākhyānaṃ bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:611: na hy avidyamānasya pratītyasamutpādasya darśanam utpadyamānaṃ bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:614: bhagavatā yo hi bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
XXnagvigvu:621: asati hi samudaye tat kuto duḥkhaṃ samudeṣyati |
XXnagvigvu:623: asati hi duḥkhasamudaye kasya prahāṇān nirodho bhaviṣyati
XXnagvigvu:624: | asati hi duḥkhanirodhe kasya prāptaye mārgo bhaviṣyati |
XXnagvigvu:630: nādharmo dharmo vā satyavyavahārāś ca lokikā ni syuḥ /
XXnagvigvu:631: nityāś ca sarvabhāvāḥ syuḥ nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVv_55 //
XXnagvigvu:633: evaṃ sati pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyācakṣaṇasya bhavataḥ ko doṣa prasajyate |
XXnagvigvu:634: dharmo na bhavati adharmo na bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:636: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ hy etat sarvam asati pratītyasamutpāde kuto bhaviṣyati |
XXnagvigvu:639: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukā hi bhāvā nityās tatra sa eva cābrahmacaryavāsaḥ prasajyet svasiddhāntavirodhaś ca |
XXnagvigvu:640: kiṃ kāraṇam anityā hi bhagavatā sarve saṃskārā nirdeṣṭās te svabhāvanityatvān nityā hi bhavanti
XXnagvigvu:641: eṣa cākuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇādiṣu ca doṣas /
XXnagvigvu:642: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty evaṃ // NagVv_56 //
XXnagvigvu:643: yaś caiṣa kuśaleṣu nirdeṣṭaḥ kalpaḥ sa evākuśaleṣu sa evāvyākṛteṣu sa evānairyāṇikaprabhṛtiṣu doṣas tasmāt sarvam idaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃpadyate || kiṃkāraṇaṃ heto hy asaty utpādasthitibhaṅgā na bhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:646: tatra yad uktaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvasadbhāvād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:649: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na svabhāva ity evaṃ nāmāpi bhaved evaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti |
XXnagvigvu:650: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
XXnagvigvu:651: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sata // NagVv_57 //
XXnagvigvu:652: yo nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūyāt sasvabhāva iti sa bhavatā prativaktavyaḥ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:655: na hy asadbhūtasya svabhāvasya sadbhūtaṃ nāma bhavatīti |
XXnagvigvu:656: na punar vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūmas tad api hi svabhāvasyābhāvān nāma niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād asadbhūtam |
XXnagvigvu:657: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ nāmasadbhāvāt sadbhūtaḥ svahhāvā iti |
XXnagvigvu:661: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāsataḥ /
XXnagvigvu:662: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_58 //
XXnagvigvu:663: yac caitan nāmāsad iti tat kiṃ sataḥ asataḥ |
XXnagvigvu:664: yadi hi satas tan nāma yady asata ubhayathāpi pratijñā hīyate |
XXnagvigvu:667: na hīdanīṃ tad asad idānīṃ sat* athāsata |
XXnagvigvu:668: asad iti nāma yā pratijñā asadbhūtasya nāma na bhavati astitvasvabhāva iti nāma tasmāt sadbhūtaḥ svabhāva iti |
XXnagvigvu:672: sa upālambhaḥ tasmād bhavaty ayañ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVv_59 //
XXnagvigvu:673: iha cāsmābhiḥ pūrvam eva sarveṣāṃ bhāvānaṃ vistarataḥ śūnyatvam upapāditam
XXnagvigvu:674: | tatra prāg nāmano 'pi śūnyatvam uktaṃ saṃbhavā aśūnyatvaṃ parigṛhya pravṛtto vaktuṃ |
XXnagvigvu:675: yadi bhāvānāṃ svābhāvo na syād asvabhāva iti nāmāpīdan na syād iti |
XXnagvigvu:677: na hi vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtam iti brūmaḥ ||
XXnagvigvu:680: atha vidyate svabhāvas sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate sa tasmāt dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭuṃ |
XXnagvigvu:681: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyatat iti idam /
XXnagvigvu:682: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVv_60 //
XXnagvigvu:683: na hi vayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratiṣedhayāmaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:684: dharmavinirmuktasya vā kasyacid arthasya svabhāvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:685: nanv evaṃ sati ya upālambho bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:686: yadi dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ kasya khalv idānīm anyasyārthasya dharmavinirmuktasya svabhāvo bhavati
XXnagvigvu:691: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt |
XXnagvigvu:692: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ mataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt |
XXnagvigvu:694: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanv apratisiddham idam /
XXnagvigvu:695: pratiṣedhayate hi hhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_61 //
XXnagvigvu:701: pratisiddhā śūnyateti pratiṣedhayase atha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
XXnagvigvu:702: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_62 //
XXnagvigvu:704: sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ nāsti tac ca śūnyatvam |
XXnagvigvu:705: yā tarhi te pratijñā sataḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāsata iti sā hīnā ||
XXnagvigvu:708: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit /
XXnagvigvu:709: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eva tvayā kriyate // NagVv_63 //
XXnagvigvu:710: evam api tu kṛtvā yady ahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tato yuktam eva vaktuṃ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:711: na caivahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tasmān na kiñcit pratiṣedhavyam asti |
XXnagvigvu:712: tasmāt śūnyeṣu sarvabhāveṣv avidyamāne pratiṣedhye pratiṣedhayasīty eṣa tvayātra sadbhūto 'dhilayaḥ kriyata iti ||
XXnagvigvu:714: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ || [12]
XXnagvigvu:716: yac cāhaṃ te vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
XXnagvigvu:717: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVv_64 //
XXnagvigvu:720: sate 'pi vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddhaḥ tatra kin niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ iti |
XXnagvigvu:721: etad vacanaṃ karotīti || atra brūmaḥ niḥsvabhāvā iti etat khalu vacanaṃ na niḥsvabhāvān sarvabhāvān karoti |
XXnagvigvu:722: kintv asata svabhāva bhāvānām asata svabhāvānām iti jñāpayati |
XXnagvigvu:723: tatra kaścit brūyād avidyamāhagṛhe devadattas tam asti gṛhe devadatta iti
XXnagvigvu:727: kintu jñāpayati kevalam asadbhāvaṃ gṛhe devadattasyeti || tadvā nāsti svabhāvo bhāvānām ity etadvacanaṃ na svabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ karoti |
XXnagvigvu:729: || tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ kim asati svabhāve nāsti svabhāva ity etadvacanaṃ karoti |
XXnagvigvu:734: yad uktaṃ bālānām iva mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ sa yathājalagrāhaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:735: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te prasidhyate hy asataḥ |
XXnagvigvu:736: yat punar bhavato mṛgātṛṣṇāyām ity atra brūmaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:737: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktaṃ tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:738: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVv_65 //
XXnagvigvu:739: ya eva tvayā mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte mahāṃś carca uktaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:740: tatrāpi tayā nirṇayaḥ sa śrūyatāṃ upapanna eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati |
XXnagvigvu:741: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād bhāvo na syāt pratītya samudbhūtaḥ /
XXnagvigvu:742: yaś ca pratītya hhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVv_66 //
XXnagvigvu:743: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ sa yathājalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:745: yato mṛgatṛṣṇāñ ca pratītya viparītañ ca darśanaṃ pratītya yoniśomanaskārañ ca pratītya prādurbhūto ataḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ yataś ca pratītyasamutpanno 'taḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnya eva |
XXnagvigvu:749: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ vinivartayed grāham /
XXnagvigvu:750: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa vidhiḥ tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVv_67 //
XXnagvigvu:751: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ jalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt |
XXnagvigvu:754: tathāgner uṣṇatvam apāṃ dravatvam ākāśasya niravavaraṇatvaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:757: yadā caitad evaṃ śeṣeṣv api dharmeṣv eṣa kramaḥ pratyavagantavyaḥ grāhyapravṛttiṣu pañcasu
XXnagvigvu:759: + + pād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na ||
XXnagvigvu:762: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvabbāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya [l7] iti ||
XXnagvigvu:764: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
XXnagvigvu:766: etenaiva cedānīṃ carcena pūrvoktena hetvabhāvo 'pi pratyavagantavyaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:767: ya eva hi carcaḥ pūrvasmin hetāv uktaḥ ṣaṭkapratiṣe + + + + + + hāpi carcayitavyaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:770: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ily anupapannaṃ |
XXnagvigvu:771: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'sana || [20]
XXnagvigvu:773: yat traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
XXnagvigvu:775: sa eṣa hetuḥ traikālye pratiṣedhavācī sa tūktottaraḥ pratyavamantaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:779: tasmāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhye 'sati bhavān manyate pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddha iti tan na |
XXnagvigvu:780: yataś caiṣa trikālapratiṣedhavācī hetur eṣa eva śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhakatvān na bhavataḥ |
XXnagvigvu:782: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyata [63] iti ||
XXnagvigvu:784: atha manyase triṣv api kāleṣu + + + + + + + dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvakālīno 'pi hetuḥ uttarakālīno 'pi
XXnagvigvu:788: yathā śiṣyācāryasya yugapatkālīnaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasyeti || atra brūmaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:789: na caitad eva yuktā hy etasmiṃ traye pūrvadoṣaḥ || api ca punaḥ yady evaṃ kamaḥ |
XXnagvigvu:795: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
XXnagvigvu:796: prabhavati na tasya kinna prabhavati śūnyatā yasyeti // NagVv_70 //
XXnagvigvu:797: yasya śūnyateyaṃ prabhavati tasya sarvārthā laukikalokottarāḥ prabhavanti
XXnagvigvu:799: yasya hi śūnyatā prabhavati tasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati |
XXnagvigvu:800: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati tasya catvāry āryasatyāni prabhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:805: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavanti tasya dharmo dharmahetur dharmaphalañ ca prabhavanti
XXnagvigvu:807: tasya kleśaḥ kleśasamudayaḥ kleśavastūni ca prabhavanti |
XXnagvigvu:808: yasyaitat sarvaṃ bhavati pūrvoktaṃ tasya sugatiṃ durgatiṃ vyavasthā + + + + + + +
XXnagvigvu:811: sugatidurgatigamanavyatikramaṇaṃ sugatidurgativyatikramopāyaḥ sarvasaṃvyavahārāś ca lokikāḥ svayam adhigantavyāḥ |
XXnagvigvu:812: anayā diśā kiñcit śakyaṃ vacanopadeṣṭam iti |
XXnagvigvu:814: bhavati cātra yaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadam anekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimaṃ tu buddhim iti ||
XXnagvigvu:816: || likhitam idaṃ śrīdhramakirtinā sarvasatvahetoḥ yathālabdham iti ||
